headline: Elon Musk Says Driverless Tesla Robotaxi Drove Him Around Austin With No Safety Monitor
summary: Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) CEO Elon Musk has claimed that a driverless Robotaxi drove him around Austin as the billionaire's end-of-the-year driverless goal draws closer. Robotaxi Without Safety Monitors Taking to the social media platform X on Wednesday, the CEO shared that he was in a Robotaxi being driven autonomously. "A Tesla with no safety monitor in the car and me sitting in the passenger seat took me all around Austin on Sunday with perfect driving," Musk said in the post. A Tesla with no
